import { useState } from 'react'; import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; function TransactionCard({props}){ const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return( <> 1 {props.fullName} {props.trip.tittle} {props.attachment} {props.status}

) } export default TransactionCard
